name: Yang Ying
description:
Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around in these two different levels. Find the Yang Ying token and fix what was broken.

Press space to play

Run, Jump, Climb walls (by jumping against them). Find the YangYing Token to reunite...

Not everything you see, though, is real... 

[press enter]

Read at end

You're Not Alone...

No matter how alone you feel, there is always someone there for you, and nothing you say or do will stop that. 

You are the change that the world needs. Without you, the world wouldn't work properly. Without you, the space-time continuum would break. The people who love you would break.

You have succesfully brought two together. They now live in seperate worlds but visit each other every second wedensday.

Congratulations, You have brought colour to this black and white world.
